issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
When trying to build a project with whitespace in the project path, the build fails with a localytics error:
{code}
[ERROR] The following build commands failed:
[ERROR]         CompileSwift normal x86_64 /Users/Eric/Downloads/hyperloop-examples-master\ 2/src/MySwift.swift
[ERROR]         CompileSwiftSources normal x86_64 com.apple.xcode.tools.swift.compiler
[ERROR] (2 failures)
{code}

*Steps to reproduce*
1. Download the Hyperloop-Examples project
2. Modify the project path to have a space in it
3. Build the project

*Expected Results*
The project builds successfully

*Actual Results*
The project fails with the above error
fields.summary: Hyperloop: iOS - Localytics errors when project path has whitespace in it
fields.environment:
MacOS 10.13.6 (17G65)
Ti SDK 7.4.0.v20180906093302
Appc NPM 4.2.13
Appc CLI 7.0.6
Alloy 1.13.2
Xcode 10.0 (10L232m)
Hyperloop 3.1.3
